channel.title: Feed the Pig Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Did You Feed the Pig Today?
channel.itunes:author: Feed the Pig Podcast feedthepig.org

item.title: Financial Issues for Women - Episode 30
item.description: Here on Episode 29, we're going to talk about financial issues for women. Email us at: feedthepig@gmail.com For More Information check out: www.feedthepig.org www.360financialliteracy.org The Feed the Pig podcast series is one of several free resources available as part of the Feed the Pig national public service campaign. Sponsored by the American Institute of Certified Public Accountants and the Ad Council, the campaign helps 25-34 year olds work toward long-term financial security. For more tools and information, visit: www.FeedthePig.org

item.title: Getting Credit Now - Episode 29
item.description: Here on Episode 29, we're going to talk about strategies for getting credit now, because we all deserve a little credit. item.title: Fraud and Fraud Prevention - Episode 28
item.description: Here on Episode 28, we're going to talk about fraud and fraud prevention, so the next time someone offers to sell you the Brooklyn Bridge, you don't buy it. Email us at: feedthepig@gmail.com For More Information check out: www.feedthepig.org www.360financialliteracy.org The Feed the Pig podcast series is one of several free resources available as part of the Feed the Pig national public service campaign. Sponsored by the American Institute of Certified Public Accountants and the Ad Council, the campaign helps 25-34 year olds work toward long-term financial security. For more tools and information, visit: www.FeedthePig.org

item.title: Job Loss - Episode 27
item.description: Here on Episode 27, we're going to show you how to prepare for the possibility of losing your job, because the best defense is a strong offense. item.title: Choosing the Correct Bank For You - Episode 26
item.description: Here on Episode 26 we're going to be looking at the different factors that go into choosing the correct bank for you, and how to determine your personal banking profile. item.title: Teaching Children About Money - Episode 25
item.description: On Episode 25 we're going to be looking at different ways you can begin to teach your small children about Money. Remember, "C" isn't only for "cookie" when it's also for "Compounding," as in interest. Email us at: feedthepig@gmail.com For More Information check out: www.feedthepig.org www.360financialliteracy.org The Feed the Pig podcast series is one of several free resources available as part of the Feed the Pig national public service campaign. Sponsored by the American Institute of Certified Public Accountants and the Ad Council, the campaign helps 25-34 year olds work toward long-term financial security. item.title: Investing 101 - Episode 24
item.description: On Episode 24 we're returning to the classroom for a little Investing 101, looking at how investing works and everything you'll need to know to get started. item.title: Episode 22 FTP -Coping With Economic Crisis
item.description: Here on Episode 22, host Tim Farrell talks with Jordan Amin, CPA about what people can do to weather these tough economic times and still get some sleep at night. item.title: Episode 7 FTP - Buying a new car!
item.description:

item.dc:creator: Feed the Pig Podcast feedthepig.org
item.itunes:summary:
Here on this episode we talk with Sean who has a long commute and wants to buy his first car. We will go over all the issues behind the purchase so he isn't grinding his gears.
Email us at: feedthepig@gmail.com
The Feed the Pig podcast series is one of several free resources available as part of the Feed the Pig national public service campaign. Sponsored by the American Institute of Certified Public Accountants and the Ad Council, the campaign helps 25-34 year olds work toward long-term financial security. For more tools and information, visit: www.FeedthePig.org.

item.title: Episode 5 FTP - Compulsive Spending!
item.description:

item.title: Episode 4 FTP - Dealing with Debt!

item.title: Episode 2 FTP - Buying Your First Home...
item.description:

item.title: Episode 1 - Dealing With Student Loans...
item.description: Student loans can be a great way to invest in your education and help you advance professionally. But they are a financial commitment that shouldn’t be taken lightly. In this episode, a young CPA provides useful tips to help a career builder manage her student loan debt. The Feed the Pig podcast series is one of several free resources available as part of the Feed the Pig national public service campaign. Sponsored by the American Institute of Certified Public Accountants and the Ad Council, the campaign helps 25-34 year olds work toward long-term financial security. For more tools and information, visit: www.FeedthePig.org. My Podcast Alley feed! {pca-38edc03ecc26965c8bfce6f9e8388881}
